The provisions in the Cri.P.C. apply only to criminal proceedings. There is nothing in the
Cri.P.C.  or  the  Evidence  Ordinance  which  prohibits  the  use  of  the  original  or  certified
copies of the complete complaints or statements made to the Police in the course of any
criminal investigation from being used by a civil court in civil proceedings.
In Jayanetti v. Mitrasena (71 NLR 385 at 397) Weeramantry J. held:
